page.title: 07FARMING.UPPER ENSIGN FARM.
page.content: Upper Ensign Farm is owned by Rickards Farms Ltd. and the manager is Mr. Mannerings.It is 500 acres in size. The main crops grown are wheat, barley, pears, apples and hops. Horses and sheep are also kept. There is one storage shed, one barn, two working oast houses, four stables and a farm house. There are 8 tractors, 13 trailors, 1 plough, 2 combine harvesters, 2 sowing machines and 2 fork lift trucks. The number of men employed on the farm is 7, 5 of them are full time and 2 are part time. 23 women are also employed but thse are all part time. The main crop is hops and the busiest time of the year is September when the hops are picked. The hops are sold to the brewery and they are transported there by lorry.
